roleset.name: spruce up
roleset.note: VAMP_UP-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. No Vncls. Comparison to ?renovate.01?. Roleset by Julia. (from vamp.01-v)

example.name: Both args
example.text: The politician vamped up an old speech.

roleset.name: seduction
roleset.note: VAMPING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from vamping.01-n)

example.name: Light Verb
example.text: According to Darwin it is the males who-1 [*-1] do the vamping .

In actuality, the countess preys upon both men and women, although her vamping of artist's model Lily (Nan Grey, that same year also one of Universal's Three Smart Girls) and secretary/heiress Janet Blake are her most often remembered conquests.
example.arg: of the artist's model Lily (Nan Grey, that same year also one of Universal's Three Smart Girls) and secretary/heiress Janet Blake
